metadata.name: Taming the mind
metadata.description:
An emotional drawing made in Automatism style with 3 shades of a black ball-pointed pen. Represent a vast number of many different and controversial thoughts which are “dancing” inside our head. Author tries to gather them together into one entity, to transform it or to empty the mind. According to his own words, this is how our thoughts looks like. In the picture you may see not only a sharp edges, but human masks and inner monsters. 

This artwork is a part of Sublime Abstraction series made as original drawings circa 2006 and scanned to a digital file. 

File:
12.6 mb  2550 x 3275 px  300 dpi  

Original drawing available at 1 ETH and higher bids. Physical dimensions: 16 x 19 inches with frame sealed under the museum glass. Paper size 12 x 8.5in
